channel.title: Textbox showing how much EXP and remaining
channel.description:
Hello reader
I was wondering, on the server I am currently working on, it doesn't show any textboxes with how much exp you currently have and how much you need for the next level. Any fixes on this? I tried looking at the RSInterface.java, but don't exactly know where to start looking... This is all kinda new to me, but I'm willing to learn, so you might hear lots from me :)

item.title: Textbox showing how much EXP and remaining
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“JavaLearner, post:3, topic:497877”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=616110.msg4245989#msg4245989 date=1362091811]
You mean correctly working tooltips, correct? When you hover over the skills in the skills tab?
[/quote]Yes indeed.[/quote]
You’re better off just completely re-adding your skill tab, due to most people not including that in their tutorials.

Read full topic
item.source: Textbox showing how much EXP and remaining
